main event: A brilliant white object with a bluish tint was observed dropping vertically below the horizon from an altitude of 10Â°.
interesting points: The object made no sound and left no trail., The sighting lasted approximately six seconds., The event was witnessed by a USAF Senior Master Sergeant., The sighting occurred while the individual was in a taxicab., No further investigation was deemed necessary, as it was concluded to possibly be a daytime meteor.
